text: (nabiye! samaharek sitinnaha). ovun kisiyam velendamak ho nætahot vinodayak ho dutuvahot (kutba kiyavana) obava sita ganimin sitinnata hæra dama e desata yannaha. (ebævin nabiye! ovunta) oba mese pavasanu: “allahge sannidhanayehi ætte, mema velendamatat, vinodayatat vada itamat usas dæyayi. tavada ahara laba dennangen allah itamat usas ayayi”
